response.overview: A true story of two men who should never have met – a quadriplegic aristocrat who was injured in a paragliding accident and a young man from the projects.
response.tagline: Sometimes you have to reach into someone else's world to find out what's missing in your own.
response.title: The Intouchables

cast.name: Jean-François Cayrey
cast.character: 2nd Candidate for the Post of Auxiliary
